price: ߌߓߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߤߌ߯ߡߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ߟߊ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߓߊ߬ߘߏ ߣߊ߬ ߘߴߌ ߡߊ߬ ߓߊ߬
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
